beer.beer_description:
Our 2025 Single Hop Series has been
designed to exhibit the full sensory
spectrum of the hops we hand selected at
Indie Hops HQ Oregon, across a range of
beer styles.
This is Lórien, a 100% Lórien hopped
New England IPA

items.badge_description: You may not be able to see through the haze, but that juicy, hoppy goodness goes down smooth. What started as a trend is here to stay. That's 490 different beers with the style of IPA - New England / Hazy, Pale Ale - New England / Hazy, IPA - Milkshake, or Pale Ale - Milkshake. Try 5 more for Level 99!

items.badge_description: Do you come from the land down under, where beer does flow, and men chunder? That's at least 55 different beers from Australia. Try 5 more for Level 12.

items.badge_description: Fresh air and great beer — a perfect combo. Celebrate your adventure with the exclusive Love Hiking badge, brought to you by Athletic Brewing Co. and Oboz Footwear. Both proud B Corps, these brands are committed to protecting the outdoors and inspiring every step of your journey. Earning this badge also qualifies you for one (1) entry in the Beer Gear: Love Hiking Giveaway sponsored by Athletic Brewing Co. and Oboz Footwear. Terms and conditions apply, click here for more details.

items.badge_description: Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 120 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%. Try 5 more for Level 25!
We believe in IPA and you should too. You certainly have a taste for the hops! That's 100 different IPAs. Try 5 more for Level 21! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

user.bio: Friendly Beer taster. Love a good Neipa, WCIPA, TIPA, Stouts and more.

items.badge_description: Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!
It's New Brew Thursday! Drink any beer you have never had before on three different Thursdays in a 20 day period.

While spontaneity can be fun, sometimes you want to make sure your adventure will rock. Checkout the menu at an Untappd Verified Venue before visiting and know exactly what’s on tap! That's 70 check-ins at venue that is verified. Try 5 more for Level 15!

Canning is all the rage and it's not hard to see why - travels well, more environmentally friendly, and no need to carry your bottle opener. That's 65 checkins with the serving style of Can. Try 5 more for Level 14! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast
We believe in IPA and you should too. You certainly have a taste for the hops! That's 60 different IPAs. Try 5 more for Level 13! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

items.checkin_comment: Very strong but lite and tangy at the same time!. 🥂

user.bio: I love beer. My aim is to taste and review as many different beer from around the world. 1 beer at a time.
